title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest tests.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Titanic
description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

title: Dangal
description: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat trains his daughters Geeta and Babita to become India's first world-class female wrestlers.

title: 3 Idiots
description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend.

title: Bahubali: The Beginning
description: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

title: Bahubali 2: The Conclusion
description: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers.

title: Vikram
description: A special agent investigates a case connected to a series of murders involving masked men.

title: Master
description: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school where he clashes with a gangster who uses the children for criminal activities.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
description: In the 1970s, a fierce rebel rises against brutal oppression in the Kolar Gold Fields.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
description: The blood-soaked land of Kolar Gold Fields has a new overlord now — Rocky, whose name strikes fear in the heart of his foes.

title: RRR
description: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country.

title: Vada Chennai
description: A young carrom player in North Chennai becomes involved in a gang war between two rival factions.

title: Asuran
description: A father on the run from a powerful landlord's family with his son tries to protect everyone in his household.

title: Super Deluxe
description: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, a ## boy who just discovered the world of pornography, an angry mob and a priest are entangled in a series of events.

title: PK
description: An alien on Earth loses the remote control for his spaceship. His quest to find it leads him to question religious dogma.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
description: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. They confront the realities of life and relationships.

title: Premam
description: George falls in love three times during three different stages of his life.

title: Jai Bhim
description: When a tribal man is falsely accused in a case of theft, his wife turns to a human rights lawyer for help.

title: Kantara
description: A Kambala champion's life takes a turn when he locks horns with an upright forest officer over a disputed piece of land.

title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
description: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran is taken back to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its way.

title: Kabir Singh
description: Kabir Singh, a short-tempered house surgeon, gets kicked out of his college after an altercation with the dean.

title: Arjun Reddy
description: A brilliant but short-tempered surgeon struggles with substance abuse and heartbreak after his girlfriend is forced to marry someone else.

title: Eega
description: A murdered man is reincarnated as a housefly and plots his revenge against the man who killed him.

title: Rang De Basanti
description: A British filmmaker interviews some Indian freedom fighters for a documentary. Their stories inspire a group of college students.

title: Soorarai Pottru
description: A young man from a humble background dreams of launching a low-cost airline and his struggles to achieve his goal.

title: Pariyerum Perumal
description: A law student from a marginalized community faces caste-based discrimination and prejudice.

title: The Matrix
description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man.

title: Joker
description: Arthur Fleck, a man disregarded by society, becomes a symbol of chaos and anarchy in Gotham City.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: With Spider-Man's identity revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds appear.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
description: Three friends decide to turn their unfulfilled childhood wish of going on a road trip to Spain into reality.

title: Tumbbad
description: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around her first offspring, Hastar.

title: Stree
description: A small town is gripped by the legend of a female ghost who abducts men at night during a festival.

title: Kaithi
description: An ex-convict tries to meet his daughter for the first time but gets caught in a drug bust operation.

title: Jersey
description: A failed cricketer decides to revive his career at the age of 36, driven by his son's wish for a jersey as a gift.

title: Lucia
description: Nikki, an usher in a single-screen theater, is prescribed a pill that allows him to live his dream life while sleeping.

title: Ulidavaru Kandanthe
description: A non-linear crime drama told from multiple perspectives, centered on a murder in a Mangalore neighborhood.
Ram and Janu, who were school sweethearts, meet unexpectedly at a school reunion after 22 years.

title: Geetha Govindam
description: A young lecturer is mistaken for a pervert by a woman who happens to be his new neighbor.

title: Andhadhun
description: A series of mysterious events changes the life of a blind pianist who now must navigate through a maze of lies.

title: Pushpa: The Rise
description: A laborer rises through the ranks of a red sandal smuggling syndicate, and a cop tries to take him down.

title: The Notebook
description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

title: Vikram Vedha
description: An encounter specialist named Vikram sets out to track and kill a gangster named Vedha, but finds his views changing after Vedha voluntarily surrenders.

title: Mahanati
description: The life story of legendary Indian actress Savitri, one of the greatest actresses in the history of Indian cinema.

title: La La Land
description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

title: Parasuram
description: A college professor discovers a nexus of corruption involving powerful individuals and sets out to dismantle it.

title: Chhichhore
description: A group of friends recall their days at an engineering college and the important life lessons they learned there.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions.

title: Karnan
description: A fiery young man clashes against caste-based oppression in a rural village seeking justice.

title: Sita Ramam
description: An orphaned soldier's life changes after he receives an anonymous love letter. He goes on a quest to find the girl of his dreams.

title: Ratsasan
description: An aspiring filmmaker-turned-cop investigates a series of murders targeting school girls and discovers a terrifying pattern.

title: Dune
description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset.

title: Manjummel Boys
description: A group of friends go on a trip to Kodaikanal but a visit to an abandoned tunnel turns into a survival nightmare.

title: Athiran
description: A psychiatrist investigates the dark happenings surrounding his new patient in a remote mental health facility.
